name: Cicin's Cold Glare
title: Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare
desc: More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.\n...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?\nPerhaps she never considered this.
inPlayDescription: After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Cryo Cicins's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) stacks have surpassed their upper limit, deal 2 <span style="color:#99FFFFFF">Cryo DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Cryo Cicin Mage at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, equip this card.After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Misty Summons once.After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Cryo Cicins' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s) have exceeded their upper limit, deal 2 <span style="color:#99FFFFFF">Cryo DMG.(You must have Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
